tasks.title: Create Life Event Object
tasks.description: Create a custom object named 'Life Event' with fields: Event Name, Event Date, and Contact.
acceptance_criteria: Life Event object is created with specified fields and sharing model set to Private.

tasks.title: Set Up Automation Flow for Notification
tasks.description: Create a Flow named 'Notify_Contact_On_New_Life_Event' to send an email notification post Life Event creation.
acceptance_criteria: Flow is created and tested to ensure email notification is sent when a Life Event is created.

tasks.title: Configure Profile Security Settings
tasks.description: Adjust Profile permissions to include Read, Create, Edit, Delete access for the Life Event object.
acceptance_criteria: Profile settings updated and confirmed permissions are correctly set for access to Life Event.

tasks.title: Set Up Page Layout for Life Event
tasks.description: Create and customize the Page Layout for the Life Event object to ensure fields for Event Name, Event Date, and linked Contact are included.
acceptance_criteria: Page layout is designed and fields are accessible for data entry.

tasks.title: Conduct Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Perform testing of the Life Event object creation, notification flow, and UI to ensure everything functions as intended.
acceptance_criteria: All functionalities work as expected, and detailed test report is created.

key_risks: Delays in Flow configuration may affect the overall timeline.
Profile permission settings might not apply correctly.
UI layout may not match users' expectations or requirements.
success_criteria: Successful creation of the Life Event object with no errors.
Email notifications are sent correctly and received by the intended recipients.
Users can access the Life Event object as per the configured permissions.
